Description.Chinese: 所有AI玩家始终相互结盟，并获得100影响力.
Description.English: All AI players are allied with each other all the time and 100 Reputation.
Description.French: All AI players are allied with each other all the time and 100 Reputation.
Description.German: Alle KI Mitspieler sind dauerhaft untereinander verbündet und 100 Ruf.
Description.Italian: All AI players are allied with each other all the time and 100 Reputation.
Description.Korean: All AI players are allied with each other all the time and 100 Reputation.
Description.Polish: All AI players are allied with each other all the time and 100 Reputation.
Description.Russian: All AI players are allied with each other all the time and 100 Reputation.
Description.Spanish: All AI players are allied with each other all the time and 100 Reputation.
Description.Taiwanese: All AI players are allied with each other all the time and 100 Reputation.

KnownIssues.Chinese: AI玩家没有贸易权，所以不会相互交易。这是游戏中的一个限制，只允许强制单一状态...
KnownIssues.English: Unfortunately they will have no trade rights, so won't trade with each other. This is a limitation from the game that only allows to force a single state...
KnownIssues.French: Unfortunately they will have no trade rights, so won't trade with each other. This is a limitation from the game that only allows to force a single state...
KnownIssues.German: Leider haben sie aktell dennoch keinen Handelsvertrag, handeln also nicht untereinander. Limitierung vom Spiel, welches nur einen Status erzwingen lässt...
